content: read from right to left while the ws row or even numbered p row are read from left to right the row of the chart are read from the bottom to the top erika knight is a prominent knitwear designer and consultant to the fashion and yarn industries in collaboration with john lewis she has created a range of exclusive new patterns and yarns which endorse her passion for british made and continue her ethos of simple design and make for 556 52111 2161 8253 john lewis partnership 171 victoria street london sw1e 5nn johnlewis com made in uk
